title: Need help identifying these font names in the logo
author: flophouse85

comments.content:
The "Oberg" line is Bookman Black (vendor unknown). If only a roman exists, then it needs to be condensed to 80% and slanted 15°. The second line I cannot identify; it is too fuzzy.

[edit]  
In addition, the /G in "Oberg" has been modified.

FYI: Please do not post duplicate Font ID requests; edit your original to push it to the top instead. That saves a duplication of effort on the part of those trying to help.
